issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description: In {{CapacityScheduler.allocate()}}, there is a call {{getResourceCalculator()}} to get a value to pass as the resourceCalculator parameter to {{getAllocation()}}, but the parameter is unused in the method. So I remove the parameter.
